settings.title: Matte Texture Cream
settings.discription: Crafted from the finest natural ingredients, Slick knows what it takes to be the coolest rabbit in the room. For stylish, classy, easy-going looks that last all day using the matte texture cream, this product was designed to fit the daily needs your hair has been looking for. Our Superior grooming methods have been tried and tested by men all over the world.

settings.title: Styling Clay
settings.discription: Slickhare styling clay is the perfect product for short, messy hair. High hold with a dry finish, the more you work and play with it, the better it looks. Our product was formulated with YOU in mind, we wanted to make a product that could give you the best value for your buck. Our 4oz. can makes sure you're getting plenty of usages while also not having to use very much product, the perfect value.

settings.title: Golden Pomade
settings.discription: The gold standard of pomade. Introducing Slickhare's newest product, the golden pomade. High hold with low shine, our pomade was designed for heavy-duty hairstyles. Made for all hair types, this product will help you tame even the unruliest of hair, helping it hold and stay slick for the whole day.

settings.title: Slick Brush
settings.discription: The Slick Brush is our take on the classic Denman style of brush. Using high-quality nylon material, our brushes are heat resistant and durable for long-lasting use.

settings.title: Gold Styling Comb
settings.discription: Our gold comb, the perfect product to style your hair with. Casted from the highest grade material, our metal combs will never wear and tear and are built for any hair type.
